extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    3.0 units fr WRIT125 or WRITP75 or perm.of the instructor. Alternatively, a 100-level course with a writing comp. (DRAM, ENGL,FILM,HIST,PHIL,POLS,SOCY) 
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from WRIT195; WRIT225

basic.description: An interdisciplinary course on analytical writing, applying selected principles of rhetoric and linguistics. Collaborative exercises and peer-edited essays are supplemented by critical reading of diverse articles and narratives. Enrolment is limited.
basic.subject: WRIT
basic.title: Analytical Writing
